title: Pope challenges abortion-fixated faithful
text:
Pope challenges abortion-fixated faithful 9:52am EDT - 01:39 
Pope Francis has said Catholics should not give 'excessive importance' to certain Church rules while disregarding others. As Reuters Philip Pullella reports from the Vatican he specifically urged opponents of abortion to show equal passion for the lives of the oppressed.
